Not to be confused with a [[scroll of amnesia]], a [[scroll of forgetfulness]] will cause the reader to forget some of the current map. [[Clarity]] protects against this effect.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Only reading unidentified [[scroll]]s on new floors will make this effect negligible.

==History==
Scrolls of forgetfulness were removed in [[0.4]].
